title: Victory Over Moab
summary: King Jehoram of Israel, King Jehoshaphat of Judah, and the king of Edom unite against Moab. They run out of water in the desert, but Elisha prophesies victory. God miraculously provides water and causes the Moabites to misinterpret the scene as their enemies killing one another.

faq.question: Why did the kings consult Elisha?
faq.answer: Because they had no water and needed guidance from the Lord.

faq.question: How did God give them victory over Moab?
faq.answer: By confusing the Moabites and providing water in the wilderness.
